department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of buoys and floats for National Parks and National Conservation areas in the Great Lakes Region.
description: Purchase of buoys and floats for the mark of moorings and Transport Canada restricted areas in National Parks and National Marine Conservation areas in the Great Lakes Region. All buoys and floats must meet Transport Canada regulations.
duration_in_months: With a standing offer of three years.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for a three-year Standing Offer for the Procurement of Mooring Buoys and Floats. The National Park Service and National Marine Park Service require a reliable and efficient means of procuring these essential items.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will provide Mooring Buoys and Floats that meet the specifications set out in Transport Canada regulations. The scope of work includes the procurement of buoys and floats for marking moorings and transport Canada restricted areas within national parks and marine conservation areas in the Great Lakes region.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3985424036
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-05-24
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-19T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-31

### Technical Requirements

The following are the key technical requirements for the Mooring Buoys and Floats:

*   Compliance with Transport Canada regulations
*   Adequate quality to ensure the long-term safety and effectiveness of the buoys and floats

### Evaluation Criteria

The following are the evaluation criteria for the tender:

*   Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information

For any queries or information regarding this tender, please contact:

*   Yvonne Ocheoha, PSPC
*   Email: [yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc
